title: USI’s Berger Lecture to focus on social justice, Spanish Civil War (University of Southern Indiana) ...
text: ( Source : University of Southern Indiana ) Dr. Allison Guzman, assistant professor of Spanish at Providence College in Rhode Island , will present the University of Southern Indiana's College of Liberal Arts Berger Lecture at 7 p.m. Wednesday,
